name: Web API Seed
body:
# Seed Project for building Multi-tier ASP.NET Web API Applications Prerequisites: 1. Visual Studio 2013 2. NUnit Test Adapater (for built-in config validation tests) It takes care of infrastructural concerns: 1. IoC Container Configuration Class (StructureMap) 2. Mapper Configuration Class (AutoMapper) 3. Controller Dependecy Resolution (based on IoC Config Class) 4. Configuration Validation Tests It also has pre-created folders representing a multitier architecture, as follows: 1. Data 2. Repositories and Applications 3. Services 4. Controllers Other features: 1. CORS Support 2. Shortened API path (e.g. api.com/{controller}/{id}) 3. Default convention in ContainerConfiguration How to use: 1. git clone https://github.com/ianchute/API 2. Open API.sln 3. Open the NuGet Console, an alert will pop-up, click 'Restore'. How to turn into an AngularJS SPA (yeoman style): 1. Do the above. 2. Create an ASP.Net MVC Project. 3. Delete everything in it, remove all references. 4. Install http://nodejs.org/dist/v0.10.0/x64/node-v0.10.36-x64.msi 5. If you have NodeJS before, ensure that %appdata%/npm and %appdata%/npm-cache are both empty. 6. npm install -g yo bower grunt-cli gulp 7. npm install grunt 8. npm install -g generator-angular 9. yo angular Go to http://yeoman.io/ for more info on scaffolding with yo. For any problems encountered, contact ianchute@hotmail.com.
